main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted with two bright lights, flying from northeast to southwest in Macon, Georgia.
interesting points: The object had a bright orange color and left a trail behind it., The sighting lasted approximately 20 seconds., It appeared circular or disc-shaped, flat on the bottom., The lights were located on the upper surface of the object., The object accelerated and disappeared behind trees.
sighted object: one circular or disc-shaped object with bright lights
